item.description:
Movie starts at 6:30 pm. I will update as we get closer.

Famed Director John Woo directs an epic Chinese language film called "Red Cliff". Set in 208 AD, this film charts the course between three warlords for the battle that unites the China into the historic country that it is today. The battle scenes rival those battle scenes in "The Two Towers" of the JRR Tolkien trilogy, The Lord of the Rings. Strong characters, wall-to-wall batttle scenes, martial arts, Mandarin Language with English Subtitles.
item.how_to_find_us: Short hair, glasses, big smile as usual. I'll be hanging in the lobby.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Red Cliff
